tuc.ece.cs202.project2

Class SortedArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • tuc.ece.cs202.project2.SortedArray

  • public class SortedArray
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for a Sorted Array

    It contains methods for

    1. Binary Search

    2. Binary Range Search

    Author:
    Rajat Mishra, Georgios Frangias
    See Also:
    www.geeksforgeeks.org/binary-search

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int findEdges(int l, int r, int x)
      A method similar to binarySearch finding the location of the edges of the search range
      int findLower(int l)
      A method that calls findEdges , to find the location of the lower edge of the search range, in the array
      int findUpper(int r)
      A method that calls findEdges , to find the location of the upper edge of the search range, in the array
      int getComparison() 
      void rangeBinarySearch(int[] arr, int l, int r)
      A method that calls methods findLower and findUpper to print the result of a range search in a sorted array
      void setComparison(int comparison)

      • getComparison

        public int getComparison()

      • setComparison

        public void setComparison(int comparison)

      • findEdges

        public int findEdges(int l,
                     int r,
                     int x)
        A method similar to binarySearch finding the location of the edges of the search range
        Parameters:
        l - the lower edge of the search range
        r - the upper edge of the search range
        x - the key in search
        Returns:
        Integer the location index where the key was found

      • findLower

        public int findLower(int l)
        A method that calls findEdges , to find the location of the lower edge of the search range, in the array
        Parameters:
        l - the lower edge of the search range
        Returns:
        Integer the location index where the key was found

      • findUpper

        public int findUpper(int r)
        A method that calls findEdges , to find the location of the upper edge of the search range, in the array
        Parameters:
        r - the upper edge of the search range
        Returns:
        Integer the location index where the key was found

      • rangeBinarySearch

        public void rangeBinarySearch(int[] arr,
                              int l,
                              int r)
        A method that calls methods findLower and findUpper to print the result of a range search in a sorted array
        Parameters:
        arr - the already sorted array
        l - the lower edge of the search array
        r - the upper edge of the search array
